artist: Artist: Kelly Leigh; Author: Cole Robertson; Publisher: The Purple Thistle Centre, Vancouver
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress and photomechanical illustration of an abstracted forest/mountain scene, printed in offset lithography on black-toned wove paper covers; 48 pp.
title: Work, Dirt and Money: Sex Politics History
